trans-unit.target: TEXT_CLSBSM011_00291_SEQ_00<tab>Randwulf wishes you to reaffirm your desire to join the Blacksmiths' Guild.
TEXT_CLSBSM011_00291_SEQ_01<tab>You have been referred to Brithael, forgemaster of the Blacksmiths' Guild. Seek him out and pray that you meet with his approval.

TEXT_CLSBSM011_00291_SEQ_02<tab>Despite knowing next to nothing about you, Forgemaster Brithael has already marked you as a promising recruit. To begin your training as a blacksmith, equip the hammer the forgemaster gave you and speak to him again.
TEXT_CLSBSM011_00291_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Forgemaster Brithael.
TEXT_CLSBSM011_00291_RANDWULF_000_1<tab>So what'll it be? Reckon ye've got what it takes to train with the best godsdamned blacksmiths in the realm?
TEXT_CLSBSM011_00291_RANDWULF_000_2<tab>Hah, that's the spirit! If ye'd taken any longer to decide, I'd have told ye to bugger off no matter what ye said.

TEXT_CLSBSM011_00291_RANDWULF_000_3<tab>Can't have half-arsed adventurers wastin' Forgemaster Brithael's precious time, see. He's got a lot of irons in the fire. That's why me and the other lads make a point o' keepin' idlers, imbeciles, and the otherwise unqualified from gettin' in his way.
TEXT_CLSBSM011_00291_RANDWULF_000_4<tab>Anyroad, it's time ye went and paid yer respects to the man─he's the one over yonder makin' a face like he's carryin' the weight o' the world on his shoulders.

TEXT_CLSBSM011_00291_RANDWULF_000_5<tab>Gone soft on me, have ye? We need <var 08 E905 ((women)) ((men)) /var> with a will of iron, not <var 08 E905 ((girls)) ((boys)) /var> who balk at the thought o' commitment.
TEXT_CLSBSM011_00291_RANDWULF_000_6<tab>Still...there's always work for the willin'. Should ye find yer spine, we might consider yer membership once more. Till then, bugger off.
TEXT_CLSBSM011_00291_BRITHAEL_000_11<tab>'Bout time Randwulf sent me a new recruit! Ahhh, it's been too long... Ahem. I'm Brithael, forgemaster o' the Blacksmiths' Guild.
TEXT_CLSBSM011_00291_BRITHAEL_000_12<tab>If yer aimin' to become a smitty worth the name, 'twould be my great pleasure to educate ye on the finer points o' the craft.

TEXT_CLSBSM011_00291_BRITHAEL_000_13<tab>Oh, the rest o' these sour-faced bastards'll tell ye it's hard, gruelin' work fit only fer the best an' brightest, but I say put a hammer in the hands o' the willin' an' see what happens!
TEXT_CLSBSM011_00291_BRITHAEL_000_14<tab>What d'ye say then, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>? Will ye swing a hammer fer ol' Brithael?
TEXT_CLSBSM011_00291_Q1_000_1<tab>Swing a hammer for ol' Brithael?
TEXT_CLSBSM011_00291_A1_000_1<tab>Yes
TEXT_CLSBSM011_00291_A1_000_2<tab>No
TEXT_CLSBSM011_00291_BRITHAEL_000_21<tab>Ha ha! I knew I liked ye the moment I set eyes on ye...er... What did ye say yer name was again?

TEXT_CLSBSM011_00291_BRITHAEL_000_22<tab><var 29 EB02 /var>! A name fit fer a hero if ever I heard one! In fact, I reckon I <var 1A 02 /var>did<var 1A 01 /var> hear it in a bard's song once! ...Or was it that poor sod cursin' in his cups at the Wench?

TEXT_CLSBSM011_00291_BRITHAEL_000_23<tab>Bah! Don't matter if it was savin' the world or <var 08 E905 ((cuckoldin' yer husband)) ((beddin' someone's mother)) /var>─'tis time to forge yerself a new reputation, pound out a new legend! An' ye can trust ol' Brithael to help ye do it!

TEXT_CLSBSM011_00291_BRITHAEL_000_24<tab>But there I go, puttin' the cart before the chocobo. Here, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>─take this cross-pein hammer. A smitty without a hammer is like me without a drink─bloody useless!
TEXT_CLSBSM011_00291_BRITHAEL_000_25<tab>Well, don't jus' stand there gawpin' at her. Take her in yer hands, have a few practice swings, whatever ye fancy! She's all yours now.
TEXT_CLSBSM011_00291_BRITHAEL_000_26<tab>Ah, what I wouldn't give to be you right now, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>. A smitty never forgets his first hammer... <sniff>
TEXT_CLSBSM011_00291_BRITHAEL_000_27<tab>Say it ain't so, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>! You an' me, we'd get on right as rain, we would! I beg ye reconsider...
TEXT_CLSBSM011_00291_SYSTEM_000_30<tab>You have unlocked a new class! You can change to this class at any time by equipping the tool received from this quest.

TEXT_CLSBSM011_00291_SYSTEM_000_31<tab>When changing classes, <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>gear sets<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> will allow you to register and save your equipment. You may then use them to switch between classes instantly without the need to manually equip weapons or equipment.

TEXT_CLSBSM011_00291_SYSTEM_000_32<tab>A button for the Gear Set interface is located in the upper portion of the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Character<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> window.
